      • createEntityInsertQueries

        public static com.hp.hpl.jena.update.UpdateRequest createEntityInsertQueries(adept.common.Entity entity,
                                                             String entityId,
                                                             double entityConfidence,
                                                             double canonicalMentionConfidence)
        create update statement to insert new entity into the KB. This method is also responsible for checking that the entity type(s) are valid Adept ontology types.

      • createEntityUpdateQueries

        public static com.hp.hpl.jena.update.UpdateRequest createEntityUpdateQueries(adept.common.Entity entity,
                                                             String entityId,
                                                             double entityConfidence,
                                                             double typeConfidence,
                                                             double canonicalMentionConfidence)
        create statements to update an existing KB entity. Entity confidence, canonical mention and canonical string value are overwritten. If the updated entity has a new type associated with it, the type is appended to the existing types in the triple store with appropriate confidence. If the confidence of an existing type is different in the updated entity, that confidence is overwritten.\ If the updated entity conatins at least one type that does not map to a valid Adept ontology type, the update fails.

      • createRelationInsertQueries

        public static com.hp.hpl.jena.update.UpdateRequest createRelationInsertQueries(adept.common.DocumentRelation documentRelation,
                                                               String relationId)
        create statements to insert a new KB relation. This method is responsible for checking that the type of the relation being inserted is a valid Adept ontology type. If not, fail.

      • createArgumentInsertQueries

        public static com.hp.hpl.jena.update.UpdateRequest createArgumentInsertQueries(String type,
                                                               double argumentConfidence,
                                                               String argumentKbUri,
                                                               String relationId)
        create statements to insert arguments corresponding to a KB relation into the triple store. This method is responsible for checking that the argument type being inserted is (or maps to) a valid Adept ontology type.

      • createArgumentConfidenceUpdateQueries

        public static com.hp.hpl.jena.update.UpdateRequest createArgumentConfidenceUpdateQueries(String stmtId,
                                                                         float confidence)
        create statements to update argument confidence of an existing KB relation.

        public static com.hp.hpl.jena.update.UpdateRequest createNumberInsertQueries(String numberId,
                                                             String numberString)
        create statements to insert a number type element into the KB.

                                                           String dateString,
                                                           String xsdDate,
                                                           String xsdDuration)
        create statements to insert a Date type element into the KB.

        create query to update the confidence value on an existing relation.
